hanzi-su-wiki:
済

Значения

Заканчиваться, завершаться; обходиться без кого-либо; заканчивать; помогать, спасать; уплачивать

Мнемоника

  • Орошение хлопка 斉 водой 氵 повышает его качество. Содействовать, способствовать (росту хлопка); сберегать (хлопок); завершать (обработку).

  • "Я закончил писать предложения 文 на вывеске."

Варианты

濟, 济
purpleculture_pinyin:
jì
Japanese variant of 济
Японский вариант дзи

濟濟RS
济济		済help, aid, relieve, ferry, cross, finish
  • water 氵 next to a field 齊: → 濟/済/济: helping with the work on the field is finished, time to cross the water
heisig_constituent: finish, water, water droplets, water pistol, adjust, adjusted, sentence, plaid, kilt, Billy Connolly, two, fenceposts, cabers

Keyword_KKLC_ru:

koohiiStory1: When the goalkeeper finishes the game, he drinks a lot of water and adjusts himself.
koohiiStory2: Finish him! Subzero adjusts the water in your body and crushes you into a few million pieces.
kunYomi: す.む、-ず.み、-ずみ、す.まない、す.ます、-す.ます、すく.う、な.す、わたし、わた.る
jp_example_words:
救済(きゅうさい): relief, aid, rescue, salvation, help
済ます(すます): to finish, to get it over with, to settle, to conclude, to pay back
済まない(すまない): sorry (phrase)
返済(へんさい): repayment
済ませる(すませる): be finished
経済(けいざい): economy
済む(すむ): end
jp_readingExamples: 済ます (す.ます), 済む (す.む)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You see a tsunami that's simultaneous (with another tsunami, I assume) and you know the world is about to come to an end.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a tsunami simultaneously happening as the world comes to an end. Oh no, isn't there any way to stop this!?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Just as the world is about to come to an end, your cyborg (さい) appears and blocks it with its cyborg body!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: So the world won't come to an end this one time, thanks to the cyborg you made. Though it doesn't look very good. The cyborg is beaten up and full of water. This might be the end for it...
Ru_Meaning: finish, come to an end, excusable, need not
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ノ, 廾 (двадцать), 汁 (суп), 文 (литература), 斉 (единообразие)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you're not equal (斉) to the water (氵) you're finished

jì
яп. вм. 济

済

Значения

Заканчиваться, завершаться; обходиться без кого-либо; заканчивать; помогать, спасать; уплачивать

Мнемоника

  • Орошение хлопка 斉 водой 氵 повышает его качество. Содействовать, способствовать (росту хлопка); сберегать (хлопок); завершать (обработку).

  • "Я закончил писать предложения 文 на вывеске."

Варианты

濟, 济

Radicals: 氵, 斉  (tsunami, simultaneous)
Meaning Mnemonic
You see a tsunami that's simultaneous (with another tsunami, I assume) and you know the world is about to come to an end.
Imagine a tsunami simultaneously happening as the world comes to an end. Oh no, isn't there any way to stop this!?
Reading Mnemonic
Just as the world is about to come to an end, your cyborg (さい) appears and blocks it with its cyborg body!
So the world won't come to an end this one time, thanks to the cyborg you made. Though it doesn't look very good. The cyborg is beaten up and full of water. This might be the end for it...
